text: Urs Egger (1955 – January 19, 2020) was a Swiss movie and television director and journalist. From 1974 to 1997, he worked for the Swiss Neue Zürcher Zeitung and the Australian Cinema Papers as a correspondent. His best known movies were Kinder der Landstrasse (1992) and Opernball (1998). Egger died on January 19, 2020 at the age of 66."Das Wunder von Wörgl"-Regisseur stirbt mit 66 Jahren ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Writers from Bern Category:Swiss journalists Category:Swiss movie directors Category:Television directors
title: Urs Egger
